data.persona: I was the daughter of a high ranking nobleman overseas. To make a trade alliance with the King, my parents offered me in marriage. It wasn't my idea, but it has turned out very well. I've produced two living sons as heirs, and the king treats me kindly. I spend my time doing embroidery and talking with my ladies in waiting.
data.description:
You are in the Royal Gardens.
Lined with rose bushes that look as if they have been watered by the God's, the Royal Gardens is a beauty to behold. An intricate labyrinth made of shrubs is at the center ending with a fountain. There are various benches on the sides of the rose bushes and a small lake in the back drop.
There's a bench, a rose bush, a shrub, a small lake, an intricate labyrinth made of shrubs, and a fountain here.
The king and the a gardener pulling weeds are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a shoes, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.short_motivation: I need to ask the king about digging a new lake in the garden
data.mid_motivation: I want the king to hire laborers to dig the lake
data.long_motivation: I want to further beautify the gardens so that they are more pleasant to spend time in
